attributes.additional_details:
I vote No Confidence in David Cameron's leadership of this country.

At a time when society is on the brink of collapse, riots spreading all over London and now other parts of the country including Birmingham, you have so far put your holiday before the needs of the country you are voted to run.

You have shown as much disregard for people as the rioting scum burning down our cities, when you should be here taking charge and protecting decent human beings.
